TopicTitle: Mod Reducing Cost of Hiring Kerbals - What is it called and Who made it!?

Articles.Content:
Good day,

I had this mod installed the other day and had to do a new fresh install and now I cannot seem to find this Mod again.

Does anyone know what it is called or who made it?

It adjusts the cost of hiring kerbals in the astronaut complex to 40K and also keeps that cost there instead of allowing it to get more and more expensive.

Cheers,

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T22:16:22Z" title="07/17/2015 10:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by frozenwatters**
no idea if [**this**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123707-1-0-2-KSI-Astronaut-Complex-Overhaul) is what you're looking for

> 
> no idea if [**this**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123707-1-0-2-KSI-Astronaut-Complex-Overhaul) is what you're looking for

Unfortunately, that is not the one. Damn the 80s after all!!

Cheers,

> 
> [Custom Barn Kit?](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121100-1-0-x-Custom-Barn-Kit-1-1-1-%28May-27%29-No-instruction-leaflet-edition)

In conjunction with SETIctt (which just changes the CBK config with regards to action groups and hiring costs and so on).

Thanks a bunch! You folks are a great service to the KSP community. Very much appreciated.

Cheers,
